articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Factories in Wonsan City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Factories in Wonsan City
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to factories in Wonsan City.
					 He was accompanied by Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Myong Chol, councilor of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 He was greeted on the spot by Pak Jong Nam, secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, Ri Il Sop, chairman of the Wonsan City People's Committee, and leading officials of the factories.
					
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Wonsan Glass Bottle Factory.
					
					 He dropped in at the room dedicated to its history to be briefed on it. Then he went round the processing shop and other production processes to learn in detail about the technical updating and production there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the factory have modernized the production of glass bottles in a brief span of time by positively applying advanced technology in hearty response to the WPK's policy of bringing about a signal turn in the light industry, thus mass-producing varieties of glass products. 
					
					 The factory has steadily increased the production with locally available materials by consolidating the material and technical foundation by its own efforts, he said, adding that the experience of this factory once again proves the truth that a great leap forward is sure to be effected in the production and construction when the Party's slogan "Self-reliance is the only way out!" is fully implemented in the work and life. 
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the factory, noting that the factory is of great significance in improving the standard of the people's living in the province.
					
					 Underscoring the need to direct primary attention to increasing varieties of products at the factory, he called on the factory to produce different varieties of bottles and kitchen ware for diverse use. 
					
					 He underlined the necessity for the factory to continue putting it on a modern and scientific basis, actively apply new technology and steadily raise the workers' level of technical skills.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Wonsan Shoes Factory.
					
					After learning about the details of the shoes production there, ranging from the styles and shapes to the weight of the shoes produced by the factory, he said that the quality of shoes is still not good in the light of the need of the times. He indicated the tasks and ways to decisively improve their quality. 
					
					 Noting that it is the invariable plan and will of the Party to provide the people with the best things, he instructed the factory to set this year as a year for technological innovation and bring about a signal turn in improving the quality of products through strenuous efforts and thus provide people with more light and attractive shoes.
					
					 Then he provided field guidance to the Wonsan Chemical Factory.
					
					 He walked round different places of the factory including the seal material shop to acquaint himself in detail with the production there. 
					
					 The shining reality of the factory eloquently proves the principle of the IT age that science and technology precisely mean production and vise versa, he said, adding that only when science and technology are closely combined with production in the DPRK can they serve as a powerful engine of the revolution and construction and provide a sure scientific and technological guarantee for building a great prosperous powerful nation.
					
					 He praised the officials of the factory, who have grown to be creative human beings making a steady advance to produce everything new and successfully combining thought and practice, for succeeding in developing seal material of Korean style badly needed by different domains of the national economy by proposing a bold technological goal and tenaciously putting it into practice. This is the work style of the officials required by the Party, he added.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be carried out by the factory, pointing out that it is of great significance in developing the national economy.
					
					 After making the rounds of the factories in Wonsan City, he expressed expectation and belief that the workers of the city would bring about a great leap forward on all fronts by displaying the same indomitable mental power as they displayed when building the Wonsan Youth Power Station.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Wonsan University of Agriculture
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Wonsan University of Agriculture
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to Wonsan University of Agriculture.
					 He looked round the room devoted to the history of the university, conducted by the rector of the university.
					
					 Looking back with deep emotion on the shining course covered by the university, he said that the university was the first people's university of agricultural technique in the history of the country founded on the personal initiative of President Kim Il Sung and under his guidance and has now developed into a reliable centre for training talented agricultural technicians of the country. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the university with a long-standing history, noting that over the last more than six decades it has trained many able scientists and technicians including academicians, candidate academicians, doctors and agricultural experts, thus making a great contribution to the development of the nation's agriculture.
					
					 Then he went round the education and science exhibition hall of the university and the room devoted to conception.
					
					 Looking round the exhibits there, he learnt in detail about the achievements made in the development of education and scientific researches and expressed great satisfaction over the fact that its teachers and students have done a lot for the development of the nation's agriculture.
					
					 Praising the university for having successfully built the room devoted to conception in a peculiar manner, he stressed that it is possible to steadily develop science and technology and apply the successes made in scientific researches and technological innovations to production in good time through good ideas, positive initiative and bold practice only when creative cooperation is intensified between scientists and technicians and producers.
					
					 After making the rounds of different places of the university, he highly estimated the facts that it has successfully built centers for experiment and practice to help the students acquire working knowledge by closely combining lectures and  scientific experiments and production practices and created good educational environment including the creation of thick woodland and greenery, in particular.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for teaching and education and scientific researches, saying that the university occupies an important position in the nation's agricultural development.
					
					 He underscored the need for the teachers of the university to always bear in mind the WPK's intention to bring the nation's science and technology to the world's level in a short span of time and train more talented scientists and technicians by steadily improving and intensifying the educational work as required by the developing reality. 
					
					 He instructed the university to train more scientists and technicians possessed of a high level of technology in a short span of time in order to settle immediate problems arising in implementing the WPK's agriculture-first policy and widely explore new fields of science and technology which are of weighty importance in meeting the requirements of Juche-based farming methods and thus make a positive contribution to radically developing the nation's overall agricultural science and technology.
					
					 He called for flying the flag of victory on the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation by dint of science and technology and demonstrating the dignity of Songun Korea to the whole world.
					
					He showed great loving care and solicitude for the university, noting that in order to bring about a new turn in training talented agricultural technicians it is necessary to provide ample conditions for education and scientific researches and pay deep attention to the living of its teachers and students.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Myong Chol, councilor of the NDC of the DPRK.

articles.title: Decree of SPA Presidium Released
articles.content:
Decree of SPA Presidium Released
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on organizing the State Film Commission of the DPRK was released on Feb. 11.
					According to the decree, the State Film Commission of the DPRK will be organized under the Cabinet.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from D. Medvedev, President of the Russian Federation, on Feb. 11 on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my sincere congratulations to you on your birthday.
					
					 Russia highly appreciates a distinguished role you have played for the strengthening and development of the friendly, good-neighborly and cooperative relations between our two countries.
					
					 I am convinced that the close and multi-faceted ties between Russia and the DPRK will develop in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too, so that they may contribute to strengthening the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 I wish you good health and success in your work for the welfare of the country and the Korean people happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Oath-Taking Rally Held in Paektusan Secret Camp
articles.content:
Oath-Taking Rally Held in Paektusan Secret Camp
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking rally took place in the Paektusan Secret Camp, the time-honored holy land of the Sun, on Thursday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.  
					 Present there were senior officials of the party, the army and the state, leading officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, members of the 618 Construction Shock Brigade and officials and working people of Ryanggang Province. 
					
					 Led by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, all the participants in the rally firmly vowed to share idea, will and destiny with Kim Jong Il and remain true to the WPK's Songun leadership.
					
					They stressed that they would bring about great innovations and leap forward unprecedented in the history of the country on all fronts for building a thriving nation, breathing the same breath with
						Kim Jong Il making a forced march, and thus make a new history of great surge in the 21st century and usher in the great heyday of Songun Korea. 
					
					 They resolved to provide a firm military guarantee for building a rich and powerful nation by making sustained utmost efforts for bolstering the nation's military power and establishing the trait of giving importance to the army and military affairs throughout the society and remarkably increase the core and vanguard role of the People's Army in bringing about a great revolutionary surge in the era of Songun. 
					
					 They also vowed to dynamically struggle to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche by giving fullest play to the indomitable mental power and all potentials which have been built in the drive of Songun, true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Fireworks were displayed to beautifully decorate the sky above Jong Il Peak when the above-said secret camp was pervaded with the hot wind of unbounded reverence and praise of the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Celebrations Held
articles.content:
Celebrations Held
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Meetings and an oath-taking meeting were held by the working people's organizations on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of the working people's organizations and officials of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and working people. 
					
					At the gathering of workers and members of the GFTUK a reporter and speakers said that
						Kim Jong Il has led the Korean revolution to victory with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, distinguished political calibre and noble virtues and thus performed undying exploits before the country and people, times and history.
					
					They underlined the need for all the workers and members of the GFTUK to bring about miracles and innovations in production and construction, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, with the absolute faith that the prosperity of the country and the genuine life and happiness are guaranteed by him.  
					
					 A reporter and speakers at the meeting of agricultural workers noted that his glorious revolutionary history is replete with the days of his love of the country, nation and people with which he has brought a great heyday of building a thriving nation to this land, true to President Kim Il Sung's idea and cause.
					
					 They expressed their determination to give full  play to the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and devotedly implement the Party's policy of bringing about a radical turn in agriculture, with pure and clean conscience and noble sense of obligation to uphold Kim Jong Il forever.
					
					 A reporter and speakers at the oath-taking meeting of officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea said that the Korean people have been blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation as they are holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem, dynamically moving forward along the road of Songun pioneered in Mt. Paektu. They expressed their determination to keep up powerfully rolling one of the two wheels of revolution under his leadership.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy were on hand.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador, addressing the reception, said that Kim Jong Il is adding luster to the dignity and might of the country by leading the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					The DPRK is growing stronger day by day as it has the strength of the great single-minded unity, he said, stressing that all the achievements made in the DPRK are the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Choe Thae Bok in his reply said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and Fidel Castro Ruz have been cemented under the deep care of Kim Jong Il and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 The DPRK will work hard to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the fraternal Cuban people in the future, too, he added.

articles.title: Chinese Residents Here Celebrate February Holiday
articles.content:
Chinese Residents Here Celebrate February Holiday
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Songs were presented by Chinese residents here at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Thursday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Among the audience were Vice-Chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Kim Jong Sik, officials concerned, officials of the Central Committee of the Association of Chinese Residents in Korea including its vice-chairman and other Chinese residents here.
					
					The performers enthusiastically sang such songs as the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il," "Glory to General Kim Jong Il" and "Hearts Revering the General," representing the unbounded reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Their repertoire also included "We Will Never Forget" and "Let's Defend Socialism" reflecting the indomitable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Sports Contests to Be Held in February
articles.content:
Sports Contests to Be Held in February
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) --Colorful sports contests are planned to be held on the occasion of the most auspicious February holiday in the DPRK.
					The 18th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize will take place in the Ice Rink located on the picturesque bank of River Pothong amid interests of world progressive people and figure skating experts.
					
					Famous figure skaters from the DPRK, China, Russia, France and other countries will display their special techniques in the festival.
					
					The Skating Association of the DPRK is making preparations for the successful festival at the last stage.
					
					There will be a demonstration performance of synchronized swimming by Korean athletes at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex in celebration of the February 16 holiday.
					
					Along with the ongoing Paektusan Cup Sports Contest, sports games will be organized among the working people.
					
					The sports contests will stir up the festive mood.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Laos
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Laos
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Lao President Choummaly Saynasone who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Chaleune Warinthrasak Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Congratulatory Letters and Gifts from Chinese Organizations and Families
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Congratulatory Letters and Gifts from Chinese Organizations and Families
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received congratulatory letters and gifts from the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact in their joint name and from the families of Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle on the occasion of his birthday. 
					The letters and gifts were respectively conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to China by the vice-president of the CAIFC and the  director of the BAIFC on behalf of the families Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Korean Family in Russia
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Korean Family in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Jong Il Sim, residing in Russia, Thursday on the occasion of his birthday. 
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters: "We sincerely wish the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il good health."

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Various Places
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Various Places
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces Thursday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Members of the corps looked round historic relics on display, being briefed on the fact that Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il has developed the KPA into steel-strong ranks fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique. 
					
					 Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, said that Kim Jong Il has paid deep attention to arming the servicepersons with President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea and developed the KPA into matchless revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Asghar Rezaeipour, Iranian military attache, noted that the visit to the museum offered an opportunity to know well about the warm loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for the servicepersons. 
					
					Nguyen Van Lich, Vietnamese military attache, wrote in the visitor's book that he hoped that the KPA would win only victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On the same day officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of various embassies here visited a national art exhibition celebrating Feb. 16.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Hanchong Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Hanchong Flailed
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Youth and Student Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement on Feb. 12 branded the Lee Myung Bak group's suppression of the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong), a pro-reunification patriotic organization, as an unpardonable treacherous criminal act against national reunification as it is intended to totally stamp out the righteous patriotic activities of youth and students for reunification in south Korea.
					 The Lee group labeled Hanchong that conducted the righteous activities an "enemy-benefiting organization" on such absurd charges as someone's "instruction," "praise, encouragement  and propaganda" and "sympathy" only to fully reveal once again its true colors as the group of heinous anti-reunification elements and ferocious fascist dictators, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is quite natural for the people from all walks of life in south Korea to turn out in the campaign to force the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down while branding it as an anti-reunification regime that faked up a new "enemy-benefiting organization" 12 years since the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils was labeled in the same way and terming its negation of the inter-Korean joint declarations the worst enemy-benefiting act.
					
					 The south Korean youth and students can neither have a future nor achieve national concord and reunification as long as such bandits of traitors as the Lee group are allowed to stay in power as they have pushed the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase through such policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and suppressed those who stand for justice and patriotism by brandishing the swords of fascism and dictatorship. 
					
					 We the youth and students in the north will extend invariable support and encouragement to the south Korean youth and students out in the struggle for independence against the U.S. and Lee Myung Bak and always stand by them in their decisive resistance to throw overboard the group of traitors.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Peru Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Peru Appointed
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Ri Mun Gyu was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Peru, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Brilliant Method of Guiding Masses
articles.content:
Brilliant Method of Guiding Masses
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung created the great Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method through his field guidance to Chongsan-ri, Kangso County, South Phyongan Province in February Juche 49 (1960).
					 The Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method is a typical embodiment of the great Juche idea and revolutionary mass line. It demands that the higher organs help the lower and the superiors assist their subordinates, that officials always go down to work sites to acquaint themselves deeply with the real state of affairs and find correct solutions to problems and that they fulfill revolutionary tasks by giving precedence to the political work, the work among people, and enlisting the conscious enthusiasm and creativity of the masses. 
					
					The President made it his lifelong motto from the early years of his revolutionary career that if one trusts people and relies on them one will always be victorious, but if one turns one's back on the people and is forsaken by them one will always suffer defeat.
					
					 In the period of the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle, the President made it an inviolable iron rule of a revolutionary to rely on the people, saying the guerrillas could not get on apart from the people just as fish cannot live out of water. 
					
					 In the rigorous period of the Fatherland Liberation War and postwar days, too, he broke through difficulties in the revolution, regarding the people as his teacher and heaven and sharing weal and woe with them.
					
					Now the Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method are applied more thoroughly by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He has consistently maintained them as the traditional working method of the Workers' Party of Korea since the early days of his guidance to the Party work. 
					
					 He called on the workers of Kangson in December last year to light the flame of a new revolutionary upsurge and entering this year he has been making an endless journey of field guidance to meet people.
					
					 Wherever he visited, the people are giving rise to a fresh revolutionary upswing, full of confidence in victory and optimism, displaying their utmost mental power in building a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method will last as a precious treasure for the victory of the Korean revolution in the Songun era.

articles.title: Unprecedented Natural Phenomena on Jong Il Peak
articles.content:
Unprecedented Natural Phenomena on Jong Il Peak
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The snow in the area of Jong Il Peak began to thaw with the auspicious February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il just ahead, heralding the approach of spring.
					According to the data tabulated in the Paektusan Secret Camp Meteorological Observatory, the temperature in the area from the beginning of February this year is 15 degrees higher than last year to make willow trees in Sobaeksu Valley open catkins on Feb. 11 three days earlier than the previous years.
					
					Five centimeters of snow is thawing every day on an average in the area.
					
					As there is no strong wind and mild climate continues there, it is foreseen that the depth of snow will go down by nearly 60 centimeters in the middle of this month.
					
					An unprecedented phenomenon of moon halo was observed.
					
					At around 18:25 on February 8 the surroundings of the peak became as bright as daytime to make the night view above Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp brilliant.
					
					This was the first of its kind there this year.
					
					Those who witnessed the opening of willow catkins earlier than the previous years and the unprecedented nocturnal view said excitedly that even the nature and the sky unfolded such mysterious ecstasy in celebration of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Ridiculous Anti-DPRK Charade Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Ridiculous Anti-DPRK Charade Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, mandarins of the "Ministry of Unification" sponsored the 2nd "co-existence, co-prosperity forum" with persons in the cultural, arts, religious and sports circles and others attending under the pretext of achieving "understanding" among people from all walks of life. Meanwhile, they picked up such nonsensical issues as "those abducted by the north" and "POWs of the south Korean army" as part of the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The above-said forum was, in a nutshell, nothing but a mean anti-reunification burlesque intended to cover up the traitorous nature of the "policy of co-existence and co-prosperity," an anachronistic theory of confrontation, and solicit "support" for it and incite the atmosphere of inter-Korean confrontation among the broad public circles.
					
					 The much ado about "those abducted by the north" and "POWs of the south Korean army" made by the Lee group is designed to divert elsewhere the criticism of it, fan up the atmosphere of confrontation with compatriots and persistently escalate it under the pretext of "settling the issues," the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The reality goes to prove that the moves of the Lee group to stoke the consciousness of confrontation with fellow countrymen among south Korean people, desperately pursuant to the traitorous "policy of confrontation" despite the strong rebuff and opposition of the public at home and abroad, have reached a grave phase. 
					
					 With no sheer sophism can the group falsify truth. No matter how hard the group may work to advertise "its policy towards the north" and quell the mindset of the south Korean people towards reunification through alliance with the north, it can never stem the trend of the times.
					
					 The inter-Korean confrontation racket desperately kicked up by the group, forsaken by the nation, would only precipitate its miserable destruction.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Remarks on Inter-Korean Relations under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Remarks on Inter-Korean Relations under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Some days ago traitor Lee Myung Bak talked nonsense that for the inter-Korean relations "to remain frozen for about a year" in the more than six decade-long history of division is nothing serious and "such thing also happened in the period of the former regime."
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					What he uttered is no more than sophism intended to play down the gravity of the present catastrophic situation in which the inter-Korean relations are inching close to the brink of a war hour by hour. This betrays his sinister plot to evade the responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations to total collapse through his unprecedentedly reckless moves for confrontation with the north and stand against it to the end.  
					
					 Accusing the traitor of having worked with blood-shot eyes in the past one year to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK with an eye to completely stop the inter-Korean relations from developing in favor of national reconciliation, unity and reunification, the commentary notes that in this period he has committed more hideous and graver crimes against reunification than what all the preceding dictators had committed. 
					
					 The Lee group is a special class group of criminals who made overnight a mess of landmark achievements made in the inter-Korean relations thanks to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 It is nonsensical for the traitor to describe the deplorable reality of the inter-Korean relations, a product of his moves for confrontation with the DPRK, not as serious and play down his crimes. It is an unpardonable deception and mockery of the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The group has committed so hideous crimes against reunification and brought about so deplorable reality of the relations that it can hardly conceal the gravity of the situation in which these relations have been driven into a crisis of total severance nor can it justify its crimes.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, there is no future for such traitors as Lee. He will not be able to escape a more wretched and miserable end than what traitor Kim Young Sam met as he was thrown into a dumping ground of history without having any chance to have inter-Korean dialogue during the tenure of his office.
					
					 There is no reason to wait and see any longer as it has become obvious that Lee is an unequaled traitor with whom Koreans cannot live under the same sky and it is hard reality that neither the peace of the country nor its reunification can be achieved as long as such guy is allowed to stay in power. Only a stern punishment of history and the nation awaits him.

articles.title: Moves of S. Korean Warmongers to Build Mechanism for Aggression Blasted
articles.content:
Moves of S. Korean Warmongers to Build Mechanism for Aggression Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference in front of the "Ministry of National Defence" in Seoul on Feb. 6 to condemn the moves of the U.S. imperialists and puppet warmongers for knocking into shape a mechanism for aggression. 
					 A press release read out at the press conference recalled that the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea officially announced on Feb. 4 that he would set up a "combined air force command" with south Korea.
					
					 It noted that the creation of the above-said mechanism would result in increasing south Korea's military dependence upon the U.S. 
					
					 It disclosed the fact that the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff of the south Korean army agreed on setting up such mechanism at the end of a series of consultations held with the above-said commander in December last year.
					
					 The south Korean military authorities concealed the truth that they had already given up taking over "the right to command the wartime operations" but the above-said decision is little short of undisguisedly disclosing the attempt to keep the air force under the control of the U.S. forces, it added. 
					
					 Pointing out that the projected building of the above-said command was, in fact, prompted by the military strategic scenario of the U.S. to control all the operations and realize the "strategic flexibility," the press release demanded an immediate halt to those moves.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Wrong Results of Investigation into Ryongsan Incident Slammed
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Wrong Results of Investigation into Ryongsan Incident Slammed
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea called a press conference in front of the puppet Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Feb. 9 to denounce the prosecution for announcing the wrong results of the probe into the truth behind the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan.
					 At the conference speakers recalled the fact that on the same day the prosecution, while announcing its results of the probe into the truth about the above-said killings of evacuees by the police, labeled the evacuees' sit-in strike "terrorism" and the south Korean Association of Evacuees a "force behind those spearheading illegal demonstrations" and, at the same time, declared the police which committed violence not guilty and decided not to hold the chief of the police accountable for approving the suppression.
					
					This is aimed to conceal and falsify the truth behind the incident and brand the evacuees as "criminals," pursuant to the scenario which had already been worked out, they charged, adding:
					
					It was obvious that the tragedy in Ryongsan was triggered off by the police's deliberate murder but the prosecution distorted the incident. This is little short of giving the assailants the permission to kill people. 
					
					 They declared that they would call for a "state investigation" into the results of the said investigation, launch an overall struggle in the future including a sit-in strike on the emergency situation by representatives of the organization and carry on the resolute actions till the honor of the victims has been restored. 
					
					That day a candlelight rally took place in Seoul in protest against such shameful behavior of the puppet prosecution as falsifying the truth behind the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan by the fascist police.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nepal
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Nepalese National Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16.
					 The work published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003) clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics being pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea represent an effective political mode in our era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the era and the revolution, validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Murder of Evacuees Condemned by British Organizations
articles.content:
Murder of Evacuees Condemned by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a joint statement on Jan. 27 to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for having killed evacuees. 
					Vehemently condemning the group for having brutally killed evacuees in Ryongsan, Seoul, the statement said that this tragedy was a continuation of the murder of a great many innocent people committed by the south Korean puppets in the past.
					
					 We extend militant solidarity to the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and the south Korean people in their struggle to foil the moves of the south Korean puppets for a war and implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the statement noted.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported by British Organization
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported by British Organization
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on Jan. 26 fully supporting the statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					The statement vehemently denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea for having pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war, disregarding the agreements adopted between the north and the south of Korea. 
					
					 The statement noted that entirely just was the principled stand clarified by the General Staff of the KPA to cope with the evermore undisguised provocative moves of the Lee Myung Bak fascist clique.
					
					 Accusing the group of having rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense in wanton violation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the statement declared that the organization would stand by the side of the army and people of the DPRK defending socialism and the peace of the world.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita Unidad No. 681 de comandancia de artilleria de EPC
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Unidad No. 681 adscrita a la Comandancia de artilleria del EPC, donde vio el ejercicio de tiro de canones.
					En el mismo terreno, fue acogido por el comandante de artilleria del EPC, coronel general Ri Jong Bu, otros generales y comandantes de la unidad.
					
					Tras hacer conocimiento del estado de cumplimiento del deber de la unidad, subio al mirador donde escucho por parte del comandante de artilleria el plan de desarrollo del ejercicio y vio el ejercicio de tiro de canones.
					
					El ejercicio de los artilleros dispuestos a combatir uno contra ciento, mostro bien la resuelta decision y la capacidad de golpe implacable de los militares del EPC llenos de la voluntad de lucha de aniquilar de un solo golpe a los agresores si estos se atreven a agredir una pulgada de nuestra tierra patria.
					
					Al ver el valiente ejercicio de los uniformados del EPC armados firmemente con el invencible metodo de combate autoctono, se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los militares se prepararon firmemente tanto en lo politico-ideologico como en lo militar-tecnico para que frustren a tiempo la agresion sorpresiva de los enemigos y defiendan inexpugnablemente la patria socialista, evaluo altamente sus exitos logrados en el ejercicio y presento las programaticas tareas que sirven de guia para fortalecer aun mas el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Destaco que el EPC, heredero de las brillantes tradiciones de la lucha antijaponesa, ha crecido como el ejercito fuerte en la ideologia, que encarna el espiritu de defender al Lider a costa de la vida y el de convertirse en bombas y balas como su invariable fe, y se ha fortalecido como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dotadas de modernos medios de ataque y defensa capaces de aniquilar de un solo golpe a los enemigos, que se atrevan a agredir a la RPDC, dondequiera que esten en este planeta.
					
					Anadio que gracias a que este gran ejercito invencible forjado como acero en la larga y severa lucha defiende las trincheras de la patria, nuestra patria socialista es inexpugnable y esta garantizada firmemente nuestra causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					El Dirigente estimulo cordialmente a los militares participantes en el ejercicio y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					 Le acompanaron el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del CDN de la RPDC, vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Myong Guk y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros directivos del EPC, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos de la sociedad.

Publicado decreto sobre fundacion del Comite Estatal de Cine
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo publicado el dia 11 el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la organizacion del Comite Estatal de Cine.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en el Peru
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en el Peru
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Mun Gyu fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica Peruana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena nueva campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena nueva campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Hace poco, la banda del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea auspicio el segundo "Forum de convivencia y coprosperidad" con la participacion de los circulos de cultura y arte, religion y deporte hablando de la "comunicacion" con distintos sectores y capas. 
					Por otra parte, acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presentando los problemas intrigantes como "las personas secuestradas por el norte" y "prisioneros del ejercito de defensa nacional".
					
					Tal forum es la otra farsa anti-reunificacion para encubrir el caracter antinacional de la "politica de convivencia y coprosperidad", anacronica teoria de enfrentamiento, mendigar el "apoyo" al respecto y crear la opinion favorable al enfrentamiento con la RPDC en distintas capas sociales.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					La tonteria de "personas secuestradas por el Norte" y "prisioneros del ejercito de defensa nacional" es para desviar la mirada critica, inculcar el ambiente de enfrentamiento fratricida y recurrir de continuo a las maquinaciones de enfrentamiento con la RPDC.
					
					La realidad comprueba que pese a la fuerte oposicion y el rechazo de la opinion publica interna y externa, llegan a la grave etapa las maquinaciones de la banda de Lee Myung Bak para inyectar en los habitantes surcoreanos la conciencia de enfrentamiento fratricida practicando su brutal "politica conflictiva" de caracter antinacional.
					
					La tonteria jamas puede ser la verdad aunque fuera dicha mil veces. Aunque la banda traidora actua con frenesi para dar curso inverso a la voluntad del pueblo hacia la reunificacion pro-Norte hablando de su "politica sobre el Norte de Corea", no puede frenar jamas la corriente de la epoca actual.
					
					La banda de Lee adelantara su tragica autodestruccion si intensifica su campana de confrontacion con el Norte dando espaldas a la nacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia sofisteria del traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia sofisteria del traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea dijo que el "infarto de mas o menos de un ano" de las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea no significa nada en la historia de division de mas de 60 anos y "hubo el mismo caso" tambien en los anteriores "poderes", etc.
					Esto deviene la sofisteria para anular la gravedad de la actual situacion destructiva en que las relaciones N-S llegan cada momento al borde de la guerra y muestra la perversa ambicion de enfrentarse hasta el fin con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea evitando su responsabilidad criminal de haber llevado las relaciones Norte-Sur a la ruptura total mediante su campana de confrontacion anti-RPDC mas brutal que nunca.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 12 y continua:
					
					Durante el ano pasado, el traidor Lee maniobro freneticamente para poner al reves las relaciones    N-S, que se desarrollaban favorablemente a la reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Sus crimenes anti-reunificacion perpetrados en ese periodo son mas grandes y graves que la totalidad de los delitos de los dictadores anteriores.
					
					La banda de Lee es el colectivo de delincuentes de categoria especial que invalidaron en un momento todos los exitos trascendentales logrados en las relaciones Norte-Sur por la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Ahora, ese traidor trata de describir como cosa no importante la realidad destructiva de las relaciones N-S creada por sus maniobras de enfrentamiento con la RPDC, lo cual deviene extremadamente ilogico y el engano y burla intolerables a la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					 La camarilla de Lee no podra encubrir la gravedad de la situacion en que las relaciones bilaterales cayeron en la crisis de la destruccion total ni racionalizar sus crimenes porque son muy graves sus delitos anti-reunificacion y muy catastrofica la realidad dada en las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Al decir la verdad, Lee Myung Bak y su banda de traidores no tienen ningun futuro. El traidor Lee no podra evitar el destino mas pobre que el del traidor Kim Young Sam quien fue echado al basurero de la historia sin poder realizar ningun dialogo con el Norte durante todo el periodo de su mandato.
					
					 La realidad mostro claramente que Lee es el traidor, quien no puede vivir bajo el mismo cielo con la nacion, y que al dejarlo intacto, no se puede realizar la paz ni la reunificacion del pais.
					
					 La banda de Lee sera condenada al severo castigo de la historia y la nacion.
